messages.content: If a plane crashes exactly on the border between France and Germany, in what country do they bury the survivors of the crash?

If a plane crashes into the border between France and Germany, the survivors of the crash would be buried in the country in which the plane crashed. In this case, if the plane crashes while crossing the border between France and Germany, the survivors would be buried in Germany.
I understand where they bury people that died. But where do they bury the survivors?
If a plane crashes into the border between France and Germany, in what country do they bury the survivors?
